title: deprecation warnings
description:
There are 988 deprecation warnings related to datetime.utcnow() usage (which
  is deprecated in Python 3.14). These are non-critical warnings that don't
  affect test functionality, but if you'd like, I can update the code to use the
   recommended datetime.now(datetime.UTC) instead.
close_reason: Fixed all 988 datetime.utcnow() deprecation warnings. Updated all files to use datetime.now(timezone.utc) instead. Tests passing with no deprecation warnings.

title: Database Migrations	‚ùå Missing	migrations/ folder not present
description: we need to build our actual migrations and make sure our database is well defined or move out our migrations
close_reason: Created complete database migration system using Flask-Migrate/Alembic. Generated initial migration with all 6 core tables (users, accounts, assets, real_estate, transactions, agent_tasks). Created comprehensive migration guide with documentation, best practices, and troubleshooting.

title: the credentials don't work
description: When I go to the website and type in their credentials, I do not login. I do not get any response. I don't get an error and I don't get authentication or an event that brings me into the application. You will fully fix the application and make sure that you have an integration test that watches a full login sequence and checks all of the routes in the site and make sure that all the routes are navigable. You will use a headless browser solution, like selenium or puppet or whatever makes the most sense in order to navigate to each and every one of the routes and make sure that authentication works, and that every single route in the site is accessible as a full set of integration test.
